name: Turing Labs Inc.
headline: AI for R&D of consumer brands like P&G to develop better products
description: Developing a consumer product like Dove is complex, time-consuming, and expensive; companies like Unilever analyzes millions of data points to develop a blockbuster consumer product. Turing makes this process 10x more efficient. Turing's AI harnesses the data from several sources and helps to make a better decision about product development 10x faster.

founders.name: Manmit Shrimali, Founder
founders.description: Manmit Shrimali is founder & CEO of Turing Labs, a world's first AI-R&D platform. He founded the company in 2019 to help CPG R&D formulate consumer winning products 10x faster and better. embrace. He raised more than $18m in funding from leading venture fund and notable angels in Silicon Valley. Today, Turing serves several global CPGs helping them embrace new way of formulating consumer products - from detergents to sauces.

raw_markdown="[![Turing Logo in white
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de925ac4591677_turinglogo--white.svg)](http://www.turingsaas.com/</>)[Home](http://www.turingsaas.com/</>)[Platform Overview](http://www.turingsaas.com/</platform-overview>)[Resources](http://www.turingsaas.com/</insights>)[Turing ROI](http://www.turingsaas.com/</turing-roi>)[About](http://www.turingsaas.com/</about-turing>)[Careers](http://www.turingsaas.com/</careers>)[Contact Us](http://www.turingsaas.com/</contact-us>)
# Meet Luna AI
Meet Luna AI - Your
Intelligent R&D Assistant
Think Iron Man's Jarvis for R&D Teams. Luna is domain-intelligent AI that combines industry expertise with cutting-edge AI to develop market-winning consumer products. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a0a90c10886eb2e88fb5fe_hero-animation.gif)
## Backed by world-class venture capitalists
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/622f522a32b19b6f8ffd5e73_logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/622f522a94ecaa71f4ece0ae_ycombinator-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a0ffb4879bde07d96b88fe_insight-partners-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a101b20f0ed77491d7974c_leansturtup.jpg)
ERIC RIES
## Why Luna AI?
Stop wrestling with 10+ disconnected R&D tools. You just need one purpose-built Luna to transform how you innovate. 
### Instant AI-assistance
Move fast with AI that knows your category. Stop wasting years feeding endless data into AI systems. Start innovating day one. 
### Increase Development Certainty
Slash development time with AI that optimizes from brief to formulation - balancing regulations, nutrition, costs, and consumer demands instantly. 
### Domain-intelligent Workflow
No more unpredictable chatbots. Luna is purpose-build workflow that combines generative AI, predictive analytics, and best-in-class optimization techniques to fast-track winning formulations across R&D stages. 
### Secure & Evolving
Continuously learns from internal and external data while maintaining strict data privacy with no cross-learning between customers. 
### Business Impact, Delivered
Discover and optimize ingredients instatly for any formulation need. 
### Rapid Experimentation
Accelerate your innovation cycle with AI-powered experimentation that learns from each iteration, reducing trial runs while maximizing success rates. 
## How It Works
Guided innovation with domain-intelligent AI
### In Define Objectives
Share Your R&D brief and simply state your business goals.
### Get Guided Insights
Luna will leverage its domain-intelligent platorm to optimize your workflow across product development stage including ingredient scouting and business contstaints.
### Achieve Results
Reach your goals faster with continuous AI guidance that learns from new data and feedback.
### Get Solutions, Not Just Suggestions
Receive formulations perfectly balanced for costs, regulations, nutrition, and consumer demands.
## As seen in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a111a60d8bfe1859c9907b_light.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a111a6d562e26001f86186_techcrunch%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a111a647a7efa76d8ffea9_logo-wsj%20light.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/67a111a6fe78167c6c80ea1d_insider%201.png)
## Our happy customers say it much better than we ever could
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de928d57591689_quote.svg)
> Turing saved us $6.7M in R&D costs and showed us what in-silico product development really looks like. The formulation conundrums we used to get stuck on for months get solved by Turing in weeks.
Spokesperson,
Global Consumer Goods Company
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de928d57591689_quote.svg)
> Turing AI did in days what we couldn’t do in months. We’ve been stuck on complex technical food problems, and this AI just fixed it like it was nothing.
Technical Head,
R&D, Global Food & Beverage Company
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de928d57591689_quote.svg)
> We’ve spent millions and years with other vendors to achieve true digital R&D. Turing somehow did it in six months.
Head of R&D Digital Transformation,
One of world’s top 5 CPG company
Just Ask Luna AI
## How should we modify the formulation to optimize for people with wavy hair?
#### Increase Consumer Preference
Automatically find the best, innovative formulations for specific target markets.
## Do we have new formulations that prolong shelf life without changing taste?
#### 76% Increase in Shelf Life
Pinpoint ingredients that impact shelf life.
## What are a few cost reduction measures that keep the same level of quality?
#### 44% Cost decrease
Ensure cost cutting measures do not impact the quality of your product.
## Do we have anyone with expertise in green tea flavoring in the Asia office?
#### Get Your Experts to Weigh In
We help you ensure that expertise is requested and digitized.
## What are the top drivers of consumer preference in Spain for our hand soap?
#### Filter Top Drivers
You can filter top drivers by geography, customer segment, or any other attribute.
## How do we optimize the level of saltiness & cost for the Australian market?
#### Optimize For Cost & Sensory Attributes
Focus on what matters most to your market while keeping cost under control.
## Which apricot flavor results in a similar viscosity to our other smoothies?
#### Find the right ingredients, faster
We make it easy for you to quickly see the best ingredient based on any criteria.
![3D Bottle](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de924eef591686_bottle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de92d80b591692_footer-pattern.png)
![Turing Logo in white
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de925ac4591677_turinglogo--white.svg)
## Get started with Turing today.
Turing keeps everyone aligned and working without friction. Engineers, designers, and peers – all collaborating in one tool.
Get in Touch
![Location icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de9248ce59167f_pin-3%202.svg)
### Find Us
31 West 34th Street, 8th FloorNew York, New YorkUS - 10001
![Contact Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de924b8559167e_phone%201.svg)
### Get In Touch
[(626) 600-1888](http://www.turingsaas.com/<tel:\(716\)214-3727>)
info@turingsaas.com
![Message Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1b9b8ee402b6381086e679/609ef34300de92fbe6591697_chat-round-content%201.svg)
### Let's Talk
[Contact Us](http://www.turingsaas.com/</contact-us>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Turing Labs Inc.**

Turing Labs Inc. is a promising startup established in 2019, located in the heart of San Francisco and part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2020 batch. With a compact yet skilled team of 18, Turing Labs is on a mission to revolutionize research and development for consumer brands, particularly giants like Procter & Gamble, by leveraging artificial intelligence. Their goal? To make product development not just faster, but significantly more efficient—up to 10 times the speed of traditional methods.

### **What They Do**

Imagine the complexity of launching a new consumer product like Dove. It's not just about a great idea; it requires deep insight gleaned from mountains of data analysis—it’s a slow, costly, and often frustrating process. Turing Labs has engineered a solution. Their AI-powered platform, affectionately named Luna, acts as an intelligent R&D assistant, designed to streamline the myriad steps involved in product formulation. Turing’s technology integrates data from various sources, enabling brands to make informed decisions about product development rapidly, balancing aspects like regulations, nutrition, and consumer demands.

### **Key Features of Luna AI**

1. **Instant AI-Assistance**: Luna is built to understand specific product categories, allowing R&D teams to ditch the cumbersome process of feeding data into multiple tools and start innovating immediately.

2. **Development Certainty**: The platform optimizes the product development journey—from initial briefs to final formulations, efficiently addressing business constraints.

3. **Domain-Intelligent Workflow**: Combining generative AI and predictive analytics, Luna transforms R&D processes, ensuring that outputs are not just helpful suggestions but actionable solutions.

4. **Security and Evolution**: The AI continuously learns and evolves while upholding strict data privacy, ensuring that insights are tailored to individual client needs.

5. **Rapid Experimentation**: With fewer trial runs necessary, companies can now innovate faster, learning from each iteration effectively.

### **Why Turing Labs?**

Backed by reputable venture capital firms and an impressive roster of early adopters from various sectors, Turing Labs has already demonstrated its impact. They have helped a global consumer goods company save $6.7 million in R&D costs and reduced development timelines drastically—tasks that traditionally take months now can be accomplished in weeks.

### **Looking Ahead**

With Luna at the helm, Turing Labs is reshaping how consumer brands approach product development. By providing a singular, intelligent platform to manage R&D tasks, they not only turn months of challenge into weeks of results but also position their clients to meet market demands in an increasingly competitive landscape.

For more information and to see Luna in action, visit [Turing Labs Inc.](http://www.turingsaas.com).
